languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Hunter scores a critical hit, they gain +<u>(PER bonus)%</u> armour penetration until the end of combat. Stacks.
Whenever the Hunter scores a critical hit, they gain +<u>PER bonus</u>% armour penetration until the end of combat. Stacks.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

languages.text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитию брони{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Совершив критическое попадание, охотник получает +<u>бонус ВОС</u>% к пробитию брони до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.
Совершив критическое попадание, охотник получает +<u>бонус ВОС</u>% к пробитию брони до конца боя. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}都会提高{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当猎人造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}加值，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, gana un +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, gana un +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} hasta el final del combate. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} landet, erhält er +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} landet, erhält er +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} porte un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, il bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Chasseur porte un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}, il bénéficie de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出した時、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}%される。この効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: ハンターが{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出した時、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}が+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>%される。この効果は累積する。
